name: Game of Throne: Toilet Simulator
description: Made in just one day!

name: Journey Record
description: At a glance, this game looks like a retro 2D RPG game, but this is actually an action RPG, where you use the Magic Eye Camera and Crystals to swap between seeing the world in 2D or 3D and progress through puzzle-like stages as you fight your way across the land.

name: Manufactur'inc.
description: Lead your new company to success in this industry management game. Blueprint and optimize your production; make ethical choices to influence your worker conditions, ecological impact, automation level, and more. Will you create a simple manuFactory or a beneFactory?

name: The Wind's Disciple
description: It's a parody of the famous MOBA game League of Legends. The Wind's Disciple is a visual novel with a tiny bit of open world details.

name: Terry's Treasure Trouble!
description:
Terry T. Cat is back, and he's going to hop-and-bop and cartwheel his way through the Feyside Islands in search of a mysterious lost treasure!
After finding a treasure map on the beach, our old cartoon cat Terry decides to go off to a land of adventure. However, a gang of pirates, led by the notorious Grand Beard, are also in pursuit of this legendary treasure, and will stop at nothing to get it.
Along the way, Terry will find Star Fairies willing to take a hit for him, ladders and bars to hang on to, bouncy springs, ridable vehicles, Mode 7 Special Stages, and minigames. Oh, and coins. Lots and lots of coins.

name: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest
description: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest is a 2D platforming game that takes inspiration from classic platformers such as Sonic, and fighting games like Mortal Kombat. The game aims to be a combination of classic 2D platforming with 1v1 fighting whilst also exploring the large forest of Veredilia across various locales with a wide range of characters, technical movesets, and flashy combos. You can take control of one of 3 characters, each with their own special moves, combos, and super moves. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and kick, punch, and slash your way to victory, before it's too late. Do you have what it takes?

name: Nicolás the Sea Urchin
description:
One day, Nicolás was hungry, so he decides to make a seaweed burger, but something he didn't know is that the burger was the most perfect burger that was ever cooked.
Suddenly, Loquendumbo breaks into his house and steals the burger! Don't let that bastard easily get away with your burger, control Nicolás and travel through the inmense and amazing underwater world!

name: Fix the Lab!
description: Lucas, a newly hired young scientist's assistant, accidentally turns the lab into chaos! Now he must retrieve the gears to fix the machines before his boss returns.

name: Fuu3's Fuun Journey
description: Fuu3's Fuun Journey is a 2D platformer that stars the titular Fuu3 on an adventure he’s clearly not ready for, but he’s gonna do it. Someone has to! Joined with his friends Fuu6 and Fuu9, he must make his way through weird and unknown locations in order to stop the nefarious Minus3 and his dastardly team from finding and controlling the remaining paloomanium, an element thought to grant the user powers beyond reality. Will you have the upper hand? Or will you fail and suffer under the might of Minus3? Only one way to find out: BE THERE OR BE SQUARE!

name: Tacti-Cat
description: Tacti-Cat is a fast paced, momentum based, platformer where you play as Ellie the cat and use fish guns to save the world from an evil wizard invasion!

name: Esper Girls
description: Esper Girls is a 2D action platformer game inspired by the many Japanese retro, actiony, and arcadey types of games that populated consoles like the Sega Genesis and Playstation, and a little bit of GBA as well.

name: Beat 'Em All
description: Beat 'Em All is a very crazy, fast, and weird platformer in which you need to beat everyone in your way!

name: Snakes LTD
description: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Kitsunetsuki Project
description: Multiplayer-focused arena third-person shooter (TPS) game in anime style

name: Wilfred the Hero, Part 1
description: Game created for RPG Maker 2003 by Brandon Abley and Teo Mathlein with the initial objective of making a console-style RPG unlike any other created with the engine. Features 100% user-created content and no RPG Maker 2003-default game systems.

name: Letter Jam
description: Letter Jam is a 2-6 player cooperative word game where players assist each other in composing meaningful words from letters around the table.

name: Freedom Planet: Shang Mu Architect
description: Freedom Planet: Shang Mu Architect is an unofficial stage builder fan game set after the events of the first Freedom Planet, featuring its own campaign mode to showcase the capabilities of the editor.

name: Techpack Collection
description: Techpack Collection is a remake of the 1980s-styled arcade game released in 2020 on Steam, Techpack. In this new version, you will find a whole brand-new menu, redone gameplay, and even more selectable arcade games! If you're a fan of old arcade games and the challenges they bring, this game may give you a kick!

name: Spore 2D Creature Creator
description: This was a Flash game adaptation of the Spore Creature Creator

name: Super Mario Bros. Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Éclipse The Cat
description: ​Éclipse The Cat is a semi-linear platform game that focuses on the variety of situations. Over the course of fast-paced levels, the player will unlock power-ups (running, dashing, flying, etc.) that will help them defeat the game's many bosses.​

name: Battle Cross Fever
description: Prepare yourself for this brand-new age of fighting game with never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Sonic Horizons
description: Sonic Horizons is an open-zone fangame inspired by Sonic Frontiers that aims to take the foundation of the open-zone formula that Frontiers established and expand on it in a different direction, focusing more on physics-based platforming/exploration, thinking outside the box, and generally forging your own path along the journey.

name: Tails Adventure Remake
description: Tails Adventure Remake is a fan-made remake of the Game Gear game for modern platforms, adding 16:9 widescreen, high refresh rate support, improved physics, controls, and enemies' behavior.

name: Sonic LaserDisc
description: Sonic LaserDisc is a fangame that tributes to Sonic CD, focused on exploration and puzzles based on time travel.

name: Wario in Generic RPG: Chapter 2
description: Wario in Generic RPG follows Wario, as he is thrust into being the hero of an entire kingdom, trying to find pieces of an ancient artifact to save the kingdom from an unknown enemy. The game pokes fun at common RPG tropes, while also including a surprisingly deep story at its core. In the upcoming chapter 2, he meets an eccentric ringleader, who needs help reuniting his circus troupe to put on one, last show. Will you be the hero the kingdom needs?

name: Monster World IV Regenesis
description: Monster World IV Regenesis is a fan-made role-playing game to celebrate the 35th anniversary of Wonder Boy. It features combat that expands on the original Monster World IV formula along with combat directly inspired by the popular ATB (Active Time Battle) system introduced in Final Fantasy IV, but with its own unique gimmicks.

name: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing 2
description: After the events of Luigi and the Quest for Nothing, a mysterious figure snags the Nothing away from Luigi. I think he didn't like that. So off he went again to find this figure, along with his friend, the Green Toad. But little did both Luigi and this mysterious figure know of the importance of "The Nothing"... As you go through the worlds you will meet new unlikely allys, who will tell you about what exactly is happening in the world... or worlds... or universe?

name: Papa's Cheeseria To Go!
description:
Papa's Cheeseria is kicking off its grand opening with a special performance by the high-energy band, Scarlett and the Shakers! Unfortunately the concert is canceled when all of the music gear is stolen, and you'll need to pick up a job to afford buying new instruments for the band. Thankfully Papa Louie has the perfect solution for you: He's putting you in charge of making grilled cheese sandwiches in his newest restaurant!

You'll need to prepare sandwiches with delicious breads, melty cheeses, and a wide array of toppings and sauces for a gourmet grilled cheese. Cook and flip the sandwiches to grill them just right, and finish your customers' orders with a heaping order of fresh french fries covered in their favorite sauces and toppings. The town of Toastwood will celebrate different holidays throughout the year, and you'll unlock new festive ingredients as you go to serve up delicious seasonal sandwiches.

HOLIDAY FLAVORS - Celebrate the seasons in Toastwood with tasty holiday flavors! Your customers will order sandwiches stacked high with seasonal ingredients. You'll unlock new breads, cheeses, toppings, and sauces for each holiday of the year, and your customers will love trying these festive flavors. This new version adds holiday toppings and sauces for fries as well!

SERVE SPECIAL RECIPES - Earn Special Recipes from your customers, and serve them as the Daily Special in the Cheeseria! Each Special has a bonus you can earn for serving a prime example of that recipe. Master each special to earn a special prize!

SPECIAL DELIVERY - Some customers don't want to come all the way to Toastwood to grab some grilled cheese. When you start taking phone orders, customers can call to place their order, and you'll hire a Driver to help take and deliver orders to their homes instead!

name: EXE Clash
description: A platform fighting game featuring many spooky video game creepypastas.

name: Hotel: Lake DLC
description: This DLC adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. This haven of tranquillity is an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors!

name: Demegraunt
description: The two heroes are trying to escape from an abandoned planet after a shipwreck, breaking through the wild environment and automated security systems.

name: Bendy: The Silent City
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Kombat
description: A puzzle game with the Mortal Kombat motif.

name: Star Trek: Infinite - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Sayajin Aventura
description: Super Mario Sayajin Aventura is an unlicensed 2D platformer for mobile devices featuring a Super Saiyan version of Mario.

name: Monster Collections Plus
description: Monster Collections Plus is an unlicensed Pokémon game based on the game Culdcept.

name: Mineral Madness
description: Mineral Madness is a fast-paced battle arena where you go head-to-head against rival moles as you race to collect the most minerals. Create mayhem as you blast your way through the fully destructible underground to become the number one mole miner!

name: Crisol: Theater of Idols
description: What would you do if your blood were your only weapon? How much would you sacrifice your life? Experience the unholy island of Tormentosa in this twisted first-person adventure full of horror and action where only your blood can be used to defeat the impious creatures that roam therein.

name: Live Hard, Die Hard
description: I can't live like this! But, I won't die like this either! Do you want a mix of hard battles and cutting-edge medical treatment?! Then Live Hard, Die Hard is the strategy game for you! Use violence and science to stop the invasion and get those pesky aliens off of our planet!

name: Ashcroft
description: Ashcroft is a high-intensity Platform Fighter in which you have one hour to fight your way out of a zombie infested city. Are you a bad enough dude to save your friends and get out alive? How many zombies can you punch before they eat you alive?

name: The Merlies
description: Meet the Merlies, a tiny birds community trying to find harmony in a world where the remains of an ancient civilisation are still visible. Build your village ingeniously, gather your birdies and explore this way-too-big world in this cute post-apocalyptic adventure ! Ready to spread your wings?

name: Static Mag
description: Static Mag is an FPS where you use a magnet enhancement to steal weapons and evolve movement.

name: Ares Fighter 3
description: "Ares Fighter 3" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: School Girl Simulator
description: School Girl Simulator game has two players in a high-security school - a fragile and brash student against a strict and fierce teacher. The student's task is to find a way to pass the exams and not be caught, while the teacher has to catch her and punish her.

name: Eden's Guardian
description: Where shadow falls, it begins. Dive into Eden's Guardian, a challenging metroidvania experience with handmade pixel art set in a world with medieval and fantasy aesthetics devastated by conflict where the history of Gods and humans intertwine.

name: Eon: Reset
description: Explore Eon Association in the wake of an apocalyptic disaster. Maneuver the artificial life Eon-3033 to battle paranormal entities. Experience an exciting 2D combat in a world where elemental forces exist. Peel back the threads of ambiguous narrative and discover the secrets of time and fate.

name: Aboriginal
description: Embark on an epic adventure in "Aboriginal," tapping into inherited powers and unraveling ancestral mysteries. Traverse India and the mystic Tiroti Islands, inspired by the real-life isolated Sentinel Island in the Indian Ocean, on a journey of self-discovery and redemption.

name: Lost Cats
description: Lost Cats is a 4 vs 1 online horror game, play with or against your friends and randoms! Collect perks and cats to dominate the game! Build your own sets, be creative! Have Fun!

name: Reality Patrol
description: Reality patrol is third person stealth-action game. Travel through time to different eras to protect history from fanatics and terrorists.

name: HellFight
description: Hellfight is a combat focused platformer that combine the experience of roguelike and soul-like mechanics.

name: Hana Exposure! A Blooming Flower
description: Hana Exposure! is an exhibitionism focused narrative RPG. Follow Hana as she works and spends time in River Town, where she will get into embarrassing situations, unintentionally become exposed, wear revealing outfits, and slowly awaken her exhibitionist side!

name: Barbarian Saga: The Beastmaster
description: A classic hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania action game, it's time for revenge! Use your Beastmaster skills to unleash your inner beast, fight with your heart-devouring sword and end the threat to Arborea, you decide the ending.

name: Close to Flight
description: Grab your grappling hook and pack your bag and swing through the skies, filled with floating islands and colourful characters eagerly awaiting new adventures!

name: Vast
description: Vast is a virtual platform by Sandman Studios that uses Unreal Engine 5 to create immersive experiences. Creators can build their own worlds and attend thousands of events. Vast collaborates with curators to provide the best immersive experiences.

name: Alien Battle Champions
description: Collect and enslave alien creatures. Increase your creatures skills by gaining experience from battles. Collect resources to craft armor and nanites so that you can collect even more creatures. Battle other players online and become the champion.

name: Original Soul
description: "Shoot, Slash, Dodge" rogue-lite, action shooter dual-core game!! Cyber ​​city in the future world. In order to stop the evil conspiracy of Group Z, Agents Alice and Teresa - under the control of you as the player, fight against the leader of Group Z, Dr. Jacob, and his monsters army.

name: Secrets of the Room 3: The Girl Group Back to the Night
description: Wake up to attach themselves to love beans, it is said that our group to collapse the house? Return to the night, but the sound source was stolen by hackers; Female group members black material scandal is constantly exposed; A thrilling bureau in the bureau, launched at this point......

name: Blitz & Blaze
description: Unleash the power of Blitz the rat and Blaze the firefly in this mesmerizing platformer. Explore diverse dimensions, solve puzzles, and discover the magic of cooperation!

name: CyberSkyscrUpper
description: This game has no text and can be played in any language! There are no repeating annoying sprites in the game! You get into the building of a space elevator, but it turns out that the elevator is broken and you have to go upstairs on foot, it will be an unforgettable Cyber Trip.

name: Escape from Toilets
description: Escape from Toilets is a coop horror game 1 to 4 players in a session. Go through strange rooms, escape from toilets that want to kill you and other dangers in the form of challenges and puzzles. Realistic graphics, easy controls and creepy atmosphere will immerse you in the game.

name: Jammo
description: This was an individual project to learn about game development. The game is a third person shooter with some platforming. As you progress through the levels, you will be able to access an array of guns and abilities to help through the game.

name: Ruinsmagus: The Warrior and the Tailor
description: Adorned with shops, a river, and new townsfolk Grand Amnis has never felt more alive with this brand-new area! When exploring this new area, Iris and you discover a mysterious shop. Enchanted by its offerings, Iris is drawn in to learn more about its wares and terrifying shopkeeper….

name: Head Bangerz
description: Do you have what it takes to survive and conquer obstacles in a bouncy, suspenseful, and exciting 2D environment? Choose your head and prepare yourself for an unexpected and enjoyable experience.

name: HiLight: Touch the light!
description: Track the light at full speed and… if you can, follow its path. Light is unpredictable and playful to lose the player. Your playground ? Picturesque landscapes which you will discover as you are making progress. Start from the twilight… Will you be able to go all the way up to lighten the landscapes ?

name: Let's Jump
description:
Jump towards greatness through a colorful world of beauty and danger.
Collect jumpers on your way and try to get them all to the finish line.
On your way the jumpers will encounter multiple obstacles like spikes, rotating hammers, swinging balls and even red evil jumpers coming from the opposite direction.
Try to survive the jumping chaos and do the victory dance.

name: Lunar Lander Mission
description:
Fly your ship between landing pads in low gravity to compete on online leader boards.
Compare your best times with players around the world. Are you the best pilot?

name: Flappy Helix
description:
The helix dodging challenge and addictive gameplay mechanics!
Easy one tap controls.
Flap through the helix, get stars, beat the best score and play more to unlock new worlds and characters.
Can you be a flappy master?

name: Clone Dots
description:
Say “Hello!” to Dolly the Sheep and her “Clone Dots”!
“Clone Dots - Color Lines Mania” is simple and addictive puzzle game for everyone!
It’s about cloning dots and making lines at least of 4 dots.
But! You also can use 4 bonuses to help you! Make more color lines with Dolly the Sheep and get clovers. Use clovers to buy bonuses. Clone color dots, collect clovers, use bonuses, set new records and compete with your friends!

name: Duckstazy Classic
description: While Duck is jumping too high, that time to examine your skills. Collect smiles and avoid bad trip guys to beat your friends!

name: Eat Your Vegetables!
description:
Who would have thought eating your vegetables would be so much fun?
Super simple, yet addictive game play! Can you tap and swipe? If so, you are qualified to Eat Your Vegetables.
Make sure to only eat your vegetables and avoid eating things like rocks, nails, jewelry, hair picks, pitchforks, lava lamps, alien ray guns, and anything else that flies at you!
Play with 6 unique unlockable characters, each with 3 levels of difficulty including; 1 & 1, Multiple Vegetables, and with Distractions! Make sure you keep your baby from being distracted by swiping or tapping away dogs, flies, disco music, earthquakes, asteroid fields, sudden thunderstorms, and UFO’s.
Try and beat your friend’s score on the leaderboard, or try to reach the highest score by eating all your vegetables.

name: Elemento 23
description: Elemento is a Creature that live in parallel universe #23. You even cannot see or hear him. Elemento is always hungry. Feed him!

name: Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution
description:
《Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution》Unleash Legendary Eidolons, Evolve Your Adventure!
Dive into a vast world and immerse yourself in a new fantasy!
Experience the evolution of an anime fantasy adventure MMO in the massive world of《Aura Kingdom》, featuring 5 major upgraded systems. Embark on your heroic journey with stunning legendary Eidolons by your side!

name: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands
description: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands is a spin-off made for fun, inspired by the retro game of peak 8 where the levels are only simple and challenging while progressing​.

name: MultiWords
description:
Your task is simple - You have 8 letters, how many unique words can you find? The longer the word, the more points you get!
Challenge the world everyday with everyone getting the same letters! See if you are the best everyday or if you have the best MultiWords streak!

name: Nuts & Bolts Puzzle
description:
Immerse yourself in a maze of twisted iron sheets and plates, pinned with discarded bolt pieces and rings, presenting an epic and complex puzzle match.
As a seasoned technician, skillfully unblock screws and untangle each twisted iron piece from the jigsaw of obstacles.
Navigate through carefully crafted levels, facing a mesh of tangled metal plates, rings, and ropes at every turn.
Untangle the ropes and free the iron pieces to experience the intricate yet rewarding world of Nuts & Bolts.
Some levels introduce metal art created from metal plates, while in others, you will use a handsaw to cut these plates and expose more holes to pin your bolts.
Do you have the vision and brainpower to untangle these mazes in the township? Get ready to challenge your intelligence and become a legend in bridge construction.

name: Octopuz
description:
Octopuz will keep your mind and fingers sharp with its deceptively difficult memory puzzles.
The rules are easy. Replicate the pattern. Each puzzle piece has eight options. Tap your way through each puzzle as you race against the clock and train your brain.

name: Power Inc
description: Power Inc is an idle simulation game about managing a power plant from the 1890s. Use the power you generate to build a city, research new technologies, and advance through the eras to modern times and beyond!

name: Music in Motion
description:
Music in Motion is a fun and casual rhythm game that will make you move to the beat of great EDM, pop, epic and dubstep music!
In this innovative game you will have to move your phone with the music!
Scrolling lights of different shapes and colors will indicate how to move your phone: in front of you, towards you, to the left or to the right, as if you were playing drums.
The 5 motion controls of the game appear progressively and are easy to learn.
Packed with over 30 songs, you'll have plenty of genres to choose from.

name: UFO Slide Racing
description:
Be there when the UFO masters of the universe have the final showdown! Bump and slide through six entertaining sci-fi race tracks and be the number one!
Fine tune your racing lines, slide like a pro and achieve the perfect lap. Easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Tower Stack
description:
Tower stack is a simple yet very fun and addictive game.Try your best to build the highest tower ever!
Tap the screen to release a block of tower. Release the tower blocks with caution and accurate estimation or it will fall off. There is no time limit.

name: The Top Hat Club
description:
Gain entry to the exclusive club where top hats are a strict dress code requirement. The Top Hat Club is a platform game where you must collect the top hat on each level before you can get into the club. There are a variety of obstacles to overcome, and collecting all of the coins on each level provides a further challenge for the completist gamer. The game includes over 30 levels, awards and secrets to unlock. Presented in glorious monochrome with a pseudo-Victorian style.
A total remake of the original browser game with high-resolution graphics, a new control system and widescreen support.

name: Supersonic
description: Race on tracks created from your own music.

name: Foreverhood
description: The premise of Foreverhood is abstract. You are one of the Nuu, a childhood race of creatures that spend their time daydreaming on a small planet of woods and mountains. The player awakes one day to find themselves under an overcast sky with everyone distraught over the change that is in the air. You navigate the space under the watch of the Sequas or parents of the world to uncover what is beyond the clouds and what lies in store for the world of your kind.

name: Dressed to Kill Sherlock Holmes for Playdate & C64!
description: playdate and c64 double feature!

name: Beefy Brad the Muscle Man
description: Help Brad Flex to Impress (Playdate)

name: Colossal Cave Adventure
description: Original Colossal Cave Adventure for Playdate

name: Kakele Online: MMORPG - Bonanza
description: Are you ready for the new content ranging levels 50-800+? Discover the new dwarven mountains and mines and go deep in exploration of their caves. Join us to explore all the new features of this Major Update!

name: City Ambulance Car Driving
description: Take ill people to emergency hospital in this ambulance game. If you like to play simulation games, this ambulance game is for you.

name: Nextbots In The Backrooms
description: They only look ridiculous at first glance, but they're not! Run. Don't stop, don't try to hide, just run!

name: Bird of Paradise
description: In the backdrop of the Bhopal Gas Tragedy of 1984, former couple Jheel and Agneya encounter each other at a therapist's clinic but neither of them are willing to disclose their reason for the visit. Help them piece together their past in order to unravel their respective reasons.

name: Battle Leet
description: Dive into Battle Leet - a 3D PvP arena where skill & strategy reign. Customize your Leet, earn rewards, and dominate in NFT-fueled battles. Be the ultimate gamer in this digital showdown.

name: Spasms of Stupidity
description: PC wargame-Roguelike, inspired from DragonForce(Saturn)

name: Susan Taxpayer
description: Susan Taxpayer is a free 2D platformer made in the SMBX2 engine, meant to imitate the likes of the later Wario Land games, with music by the Super Lesbian Animal RPG Composer, Beatrix Quinn! Follow Susan and her coworker Franky as she powers through the worst workday ever. Help her platform through a myriad of office-themed levels, from orientation videos to mailrooms to forests made of printer paper!

name: Travis' Coward Combustion
description:
In this fast-paced action platformer, you delve into Lost Angeles, a city plagued by supernatural parasites called "wisps". Aside from looking suspiciously cute and marketable, wisps can possess human hosts and give them supernatural abilities in exchange for the person's free will. When a wisp gets bored enough, it breaks the connection to find a new host, leaving the current one behind with severe injuries in the process.

In order to protect the city, a governmental organization was created: P.C.E., which exists to Protect, Contain and Exterminate this threat and keep Lost Angeles at peace.

But what happens when someone is unfortunate enough to be possessed by no mere wisp, but one megalomaniac enough to drag its host around in a rampage quest?

name: Ruinsmagus: Complete
description: Complete the Magic – The complete edition of RUINSMAGUS includes both the main game and its DLC, The Warrior and the Tailor, all in one convenient bundle. Everything is included! This also includes full English voice-over, and you can also enjoy the original Japanese voice-over with English subtitles.

name: Hyperlight
description: Sin descripción

name: Dirappen Restoration
description: The planet has been overrun! Play as the lone Dirappen Soldier Unit D6-4 in its epic quest to defeat the alien invaders and restore the planet of Darptha to the rightful rule of King Darpon.

name: Lumiva Legacy
description: Lumiva Legacy is a fast-paced action platformer about three young multivas, Alex "Bingo" Rivero, Salamon Avery, and Roy Cruz, on their journey to stop D-Tech from invading their home of Neuo Town. The trio will have to put their skills to the test to conquer many challenges, defeat countless foes, and explore exotic locations with their various abilities and the help of Elemental Charges!

name: Jimmy's Lost Fruits Journey 2: Veggocalypse
description: Jimmy's Lost Fruits Journey 2: Veggocalypse is an Earthworm Jim and Jazz Jackrabbit 2-inspired shoot-em-up platformer with fluent & wacky animation, high-speed moveset, and lots of fruit-filled action!

name: Candy Rangers
description: Fight nature in Candy Rangers, an on-rails shooter game where you control 4 characters at once. Shoot down chains of enemies, don't run out of time and find medals to unlock new levels, areas and boss fights! Use your team wisely!

name: Zorropa y La Torre de las Sombras
description:
Zorropa is a young fox that has to leave his house due to some spiky plants growing all over the island, it is at this moment that your adventure begins.
Use your abilities to make your way into towers that behold the power of the sun, maybe with this power you can save the island, or start an adventure and save the world.

name: Dotty
description: You play as Dotty, a cute little ladybug who can shoot glitter from her fingertips!

name: 'Round The Mind
description: 'Round The Mind is a hybrid-genre, fast-paced platformer where you, a young therapist kid who is accompanied by a big floating talking TV, help people feel better as a member from the 'Round The Mind organization.

name: Octogram
description: Sin descripción

name: Cube Crusaders
description: Mow down all who stand in the way of your Crusade. Become a benevolent conqueror, or a brutal oppressor to those you achieve victory over. Your actions decide the fate of the planet.

name: Crazy Kitchen
description: Hordes of Hungrys are coming in waves. Protect the Kitchen and its precious snacks at all costs!

name: Cosmogelica
description: Blast off into space! Help Monica and her team explore the galaxy, fight off hordes of enemies, and clean up the mysterious cosmic gel in this retro-arcade inspired action shooter!

name: Bun 'N' Gun
description: Bun 'N' Gun is a fast action-based run-and-gun game where you command different weapon elements and jump through several action-packed stages full of enemies, traps, and powerups.

name: Egret II Mini: Arcade Memories Vol. II
description: Sin descripción

name: Bokura no Keshigomu Otoshi 3 + Special Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Majo no Furo Life
description: Sin descripción

name: UnVeil the World
description: Sin descripción

name: Horses
description: In Horses, you will take on the role of a summer worker taking a break from his college studies. You will be responsible for taking care of the farm and its animals for a fortnight. Each day, as you explore the farm, you'll encounter many "surprises," peeling back the layers of the farm's unsettling mysteries.

name: Sunfall: Children of Adiona
description: Delve into a psychological sci-fi shooter, masterfully leading a team of 5 characters to harmonious combat brilliance. Navigate heartwarming connections and intense drama, unlocking enhanced combat capabilities to conquer hostile alien fauna and unveil the mystery behind parental disappearance.

name: Tax-Force
description: Hunt down tax-evading mutant billionaires and reinvest in society in this narrative Action Rogue-lite meets Political Sim.

name: Discarnate
description: Immerse yourself in the chilling ambiance of the 1970s, an era that witnessed the surge of amateur paranormal investigators. Step into their shoes in Discarnate, unearthing authentic demonology lore and summoning a world where malevolent entities lurk. Your task? Bring them to light and banish them.

name: Complex Hero
description: 20 years of production. Complex Hero "Complex Hiro" is a late 90's Super Famicom RPG style game with the theme of "an RPG that is more interesting than nostalgia". A feature-length 2D pixel art sci-fi RPG created with the concept of creating a new version of the classic pixel art RPG of the time.

name: Imperial Saga: Eclipse
description: Sin descripción

name: Draculesti
description: Draculesti is a villain-focused reimagining of the classic novel Dracula that shines a light on the shadowy figures of Renfield, Dracula's Brides, and Dracula himself. Be enthralled by the residents of Castle Dracula, and thrill at a dark narrative with strong LGBTQI+ themes.

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition – Hero Cosmetic Pack: Lizzie
description: Meet Lizzie the Pirate (British): Although raised as daughter of an English nobleman, Elisabet Ramsey prefers to be buccaneering in the Caribbean with - and without - Her Majesty's letter of marque.

name: 15 Minutes At The World's End
description: Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the chaotic realms of the apocalypse in this intense bullet hell. In a world teetering on the edge of oblivion, you must harness your reflexes, strategic prowess, and sheer determination to survive the onslaught of otherworldly adversaries.

name: Heroes of Row
description: Auto-Row-Shooter, where you become more powerful with each upgrade you collect! Heroes of Row is a fantasy auto-row shooter game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against powerful monsters and bosses!

name: Isla Mosa Adventure: The Secret of the Southern Capital
description: Players will take control of "Hoki," to explore the unfamiliar and mysterious southern island, "Isla Mosa." In order to secure a place for the villagers on the island, Hoki promises the police to interact with two problematic individuals on the island, investigating the conspiracy behind them...

name: Super Bio-Man
description: Super Bio-Man is the ultimate gunslinger and the guardian of our galaxy. Using his arsenal and metal fist, he shows the invaders from outer space - who's the boss here.

name: StickMan vs. MagicWorld
description: Stick man fight everyone in middle ages, using cold swords to fight against raging magic

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 3: Ex Image Pulses - Nova and Desna pack
description: This pack adds 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt's "Nova," 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt 2's "Desna," plus 3 additional passive-type Image Pulses, for a total of 11.

name: Combat Zone
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Combat Zone! Get ready for an intense first-person shooting experience like never before.

name: Speechbound: A language RPG
description: Unleash your linguistic prowess with Speechbound: a multi platform RPG where the thrill of gaming and the power of education converge. Engage in a captivating narrative, battle formidable foes, tackle exciting language exercises, and discover the beauty of Babyl Moon.

name: My Neighbour Mr.Ghost
description: Exploratory action-adventure game. Shoot the ghosts in the trapped school and escape! Can you escape from mysterious events?

name: Descended
description: A deep sea adventure for 1-6 players set far from the surface in an alien sea. Fight, befriend, and study your environment to unlock specialised mutations and tailor ecosystems in which you thrive. Spread Light beneath the Twilight Zone!

name: Fractured Alliance
description: Classic real time strategy! Command varied forces, gather resources, build your base, adapt tactics, and dominate vast landscapes. Script your legacy in rich campaigns and dynamic multiplayer battles. Shape the destiny of the world!

name: Aeolus Fighter 3
description: "Aeolus Fighter 3" is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. Players control the protagonist's fighter plane to fight enemies in the universe.

name: Anachronic
description: Anachronic is a single-player 2D puzzle platformer where physics is exploited through time manipulation.

name: Ritual: Path of Darkness
description: Ritual is a tower defense that deals with a sorcerer who must draw runes to invoke a goddess of death. During the summoning, villagers and believers will try to overthrow you. To achieve your goal, you must acquire improvements that enhance your rituals, or the defense of your fortress.

name: Degraman: Act II - Victor
description: An otome visual novel with the main character trapped in a new, cruel reality. A lot of choices, unpredictably and cruelly affecting the outcome.

name: Redemption: Wrath of Sin
description: Immerse yourself in a chilling world of Horror. Solving intricate puzzles. Experience heart-pounding moments, where you must rely on your wits to survive. Collect clues to unravel the dark secrets hidden within. Use the intuitive inventory system to manage your resources, to survive this nightmare.

name: Fairy Trails: Battle for Ever After
description: Fairy tales have started to invade your kingdom and it's up to you and your trusty companions to take them down and survive. Fairy Tales is a fantastical game with rogue-lite elements where the choices you make can drastically affect gameplay.

name: Wildlands
description: Dive into a unique adventure that will put you against a world ruled by natural forces! Explore, craft, battle predators, tame animals, build homes, harvest crops & so much more. Gather your friends, grab a weapon, and head out to conquer the Wildlands!

name: Eve of the Storm
description: Eve Of Storm is a village building game where you draw card, expand island, building structures, and more.

name: Paver Simulator
description: Did you ever dream to become a paving artist? Perform tasks, during which the most important thing is creativity and precision. According to your design you lay different types of paving stones, so you earn money and raise the level of your reputation. Test your skills in the Paver Simulator

name: Bruteforce: Survivors
description: Bruteforce: Survivors is a dark techno-fantasy top-down ARPG where players combat hordes of foes, exploring diverse biomes. Face intense challenges, risk losing treasures upon death, but emerge victorious to reap immense rewards.

name: V
description: A real-life VTuber in a game! A multi-ending romance simulation game developed by a group of individual Vtubers.

name: Miyu's Cursed Store
description: Step into the shoes of a young shopkeeper in this unique RPG sim. Thrive in commerce and battles, defining your legacy in the underworld.

name: Resourceful.World
description: Join Healthy's thrilling quest to rescue their sister Nova and save the endangered planet Nimbylon! Explore this 2.5D planet scroller, solving puzzles, harnessing energies, managing the atmosphere, and uncovering interplanetary secrets in an enchanting adventure.

name: SauceLore
description: Embark on a silly little adventure through the wonderful Kingdom of Daanco! Help Saucey and friends save the kingdom from evil in this Turn-Based Combat RPG!

name: JellyCod
description: Jellycod recaptures the core of classic shooters. Return to the simple days of playing first person shooters with your friends. Grab your bolt action rifle in 'rifles only' mode or compete in 5v5 Search and Destroy. Wishlist now!

name: Flaw
description: Find a way out of here and get back to earth in FLAW, a retro-FPS inspired by cult classics: Unreal, Quake 2, Half-Life and many others. You and the Flaming Dawn’s passengers were looking for a better life among the stars, you have yet found only despair and darkness.

name: Boyfriend Exorcist
description: You were meant to exorcise the ghost, not flirt with him! Choose your soulmate from ghost enthusiasts – dead or alive – and unravel the conspiracy lurking beneath the haunting in this exorcist dating sim.

name: A Song of Sunlight
description: An RPG set in a distant, lonely future. Follow Arem, a young man lured from his small island community to explore the desolate megastructure beneath it: “The Well.” With the simple goal of finding the exit, Arem will burden himself with something more terrible than he ever thought possible.

name: Repair Adventure
description: "An adventure to fix a 34 year old car"

name: Hunters: Uprising
description: Hunters: Uprising is a hardcore, tactical PvPvE first-person shooter. Track and kill dangerous alpha monsters in the infested zones around the world, kill nightmarish monsters and outwit other players - alone or in a group. Then rest in the safe zone, upgrade your base, hunt, fish and survive.

name: Project Perun
description: A sci-fi action-adventure game in VR.

name: Fossil Diggers VR
description: Explore, solve puzzles, uncover fossils, build dinosaurs, and watch them come alive before your eyes.

name: Rabbit's Fall
description: It will be a journey from scratch where you'll need to tend to your farm with a lot of hard work while striving on a mission to reestablish the city's guild for gaining recognition and respect.

name: Combat Kart
description: A casual yet thrilling kart racing game. Experience top-notch drifting, exhilarating nitro boosts, adorable characters, and unique combat skills. Supports local multiplayer for up to four players and Remote Play Together!Get the ultimate experience on the Steam Deck as well.

name: Echoes of Humanity
description: Immerse yourself in the unpredictable world of biopunk. Explore an organic island, abandoned cities, mushroom forests and toxic wastelands. Modify your character and build a powerful deck to fight back against the crazed mutants on the path to the truth

name: Leafy Trails: Lost Soul
description: Explore a lush and mystical overgrown realm, where nature's magic thrives in every corner. Venture through dense forests, shimmering meadows, and hidden groves as you follow the path of a courageous fox on a mission to save their beloved village.

name: 100 Steps
description: 100 Steps is a roguelike tower crawler in a fantasy boardgame setting. In search of glory, you have accepted the gods’ devious challenge of climbing the Tower. Play your hand, adventurer. And watch your step.

name: Demon's Den
description: Demon's Den is an Arena-Shooter-Roguelite from a bird's viewpoint, where you aim to explore and conquer a den teeming with demons. Select from various upgrades that influence and alter the gameplay to create unique builds and survive until only you remain as the sole survivor.

name: Nyana
description: Join Nyana on her quest to both shatter the chains that have shackled her people and rebuild their society back up from the brink of extinction. Nyana is a story rich metroidvania set in an oppressive, yet beautifully hand-drawn world.

name: The Signal
description: Venture into the unknown on an uncharted alien planet filled with wonder and peril. Explore and survive by leveraging your creativity to craft infrastructure, equipment, and vehicles of your own designs. Awaken the dormant secret of a one-of-a-kind planet in an expedition of 1 to 16 players.

name: Auto Check Up Simulator
description: Auto Check Up Simulator is an immersive simulation game that offers realistic car inspection and driving experience. Earn money, buy and upgrade vehicles, manage the economy, and prove yourself in the world of automobiles!

name: T.A.L.E.S.
description: The princess of fairy tales has experienced it all, everything. Poisoned, imprisoned, cursed, insulted by her stepfamily... But that's all over now. The princess has laid her hands on an artifact to change the course of history, and it has repercussions on all the tales...

name: Samira's House
description: Uncover the dark secrets of Samira´s House! Explore a haunted house, solve puzzles, and confront ghosts. Can you escape in time?

name: Gulf Echoes: Memories of the Past
description: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Bunraku
description: Experience the ancient art of Bunraku theater in fast-paced puppet battles between up to 8 players. Dash through your opponents, master the art of parrying and use all kinds of jutsus and shinobi tools to perform the best ninja show.

name: Dark Pages
description: Descend into the depths of the Blocker Library, a place where darkness and terror intertwine. Solve puzzles, confront unique and horrifying monsters, and uncover the chilling story of this establishment. Will you find a way out, or will you become another dark page in this twisted tale of horror?

name: When Life Gives You Lemons
description: From hookups to deep connections, your heart's desires bloom in this romantic tale. Life may be messy, but love makes it extraordinary.

name: Neo Dance
description: Discover Neo Dance, the exciting 4-point music game! Immerse yourself in a dystopian cyberpunk world and face, to the rhythm of music, hundreds of robots in this unique experience. Are you ready for the rhythmic battle?

name: You've been ReMaid!
description: Run for your life as you try to survive the night while being stalked by a cute maid who is dead set on teaching you some manners. Uncover secrets, outsmart your enemies, and embrace the absurd. Will you make it through the night?

name: Cosmos Cat
description: Combat endless waves of ships as Cosmos Cat in this space action rogue-lite! Compete or cooperate with friends in optional local multiplayer mode.

name: Hooked
description: Escape the chaos of modern life in Rosewood, a quaint town nestled in the heart of nature. With nothing but a patch of land by the lake and a burning passion for fishing, are you ready to seize the opportunity and build a thriving business that rivals even the biggest city corporations?

name: Joint Recall
description: You’re locked in a building from a horror movie. There are monsters and puzzles around, resources are never enough and all the survivors are complete strangers. Will you help each other? Let's find out!

name: Black Jackal
description: Pilot your way through the deadly remains of derelict spacecraft, solve their mysteries, and get out with everything that isn't nailed down.

name: Illuminary
description: You find yourself catapulted back in time to the beginning of existence, and into the darkness where everything began. The Universe is yet to be born from a glimmer of light. You are called to discover and co-create a new existence with the help of colours and sound.

name: Dear, Virginia
description: embark on an emotionally charged journey through a vast open-world landscape as you assume the role of an inspiring protagonist set during the American Civil War, the game transports players to a gritty and historically inspired world filled with rich storytelling and immersive gameplay.

name: Cat City
description: Step into the shoes of a mayor of a growing cat town! Talk to your residents, discover their life stories, help them with their daily tasks and complete quests to improve your city.

name: Zen Fisher
description: Chill out, unwind and embark on a journey in Zen Fisher to collect all unique fish species and rarities in this vast, stylized 3D open world fishing game. Do you have what it takes to unlock the deepest secrets of the world?

name: Pedro of Brazil
description: Delve into the epic saga of the Brazilian Empire in "Pedro of Brazil". Master gunfights, swordplay, and hand-to-hand combat. Play as historic figures and immerse yourself in events like the Brazilian Independence and the Paraguayan War. Relive the glory and challenges of an era!

name: Creature Evolution Simulator
description: Design an ecosystem and watch your creatures evolve through millions of years by means of natural selection. See them fight for survival and produce offspring which share their genes… occasionally mutating to form monstrosities! What will your creature’s final-stage of evolution be?

name: The Bearer & The Last Flame
description: The Bearer & The Last Flame is a dark fantasy action adventure. In a realm where death is rampant, a living soul has received his commission, to carry the last flame and light the lands of the night, the dark lands.

name: Armored Souls
description: Armored Souls is a 2D Soulslike Action game with Roguelike elements and challenging boss fights set in a machine-driven dystopia. Navigate a beautifully desolate world, scrap enemies for parts and return to your foundry to assemble a variety of game-changing skills, programs and mechanical upgrades.

name: The Keeper's Book
description: Join a young hero in his journey through a magical world filled with wonders and perils, and help him reveal the mystery that lies between the pages of the Keeper’s Book. Explore, craft and fight in this brand new indie adventure.

name: In the Same Boat
description: Embark on an adventure across the ocean! In this captivating cooperative sailing game, one player commands the ship, while the other is confined to the captain's cabin, solely navigating with the map. Successfully delivering goods on time will demand the crew's adept communication and skill.

name: Town Squared
description: Town Squared is a peaceful city building and puzzle game. Create cute architecture as you take a tiny voyage, discovering and unlocking new buildings along the way.

name: Crystal Ball Critters
description: Crystal Ball Critters is a multiplayer ball-racing game, in which you race your friends through our antagonist's carefully thought out multiverse of adventures! Play by yourself or against up to 4 of your friends to find out who can beat each stage first.

name: Shadow of Murders
description: Shadow of Murders is a murder-solving game.Help solve the FBI's unsolvable murders with Psychiatrist Joseph. People and situations are not normal. Make people talk. Gather evidence. Find the killer and inform the FBI.

name: PsionicAwake Playtest
description: Sin descripción

name: Melvin's Blocky Adventure
description: A block-pushing puzzle game set in a water-filled world. Push to the blocks to advance to the next puzzle.

name: Isekai'd
description: Be transported into a fantasy world with your friends in this open-world multiplayer RPG. Complete quests where your choices shape the outcome, defeat bosses, explore dungeons, and claim castles for your own guild.

name: Gelluloid Domination: SpaceLab Simulator
description: Run a spaceship's lab module all by yourself while trying to find a cure for close-to-extinct humanity. Make repairs to various systems of the ship, solve technical problems, perform maintenance, and upgrade tools that will help you to overcome the most unusual challenges.

name: Devastated Path
description: The life of an ordinary freelance programmer Romero, whose existence is swallowed up by darkness. Not the fairy tail, but a dark part of humanity.

name: Cook-A-Geddon
description: Jump into a quirky action-adventure set in a stylized and food-themed fantasy world. Switch between three chefs and use your skills to fight against the mighty grease titan and his minions.Fast-paced action combat, odd characters and plenty of puns await you.

name: Cracked
description: Frustratingly difficult egg-centric physics-based 3D platforming obstacle course. Try to make it to the end without getting cracked.

name: Kyub Crazy Colors
description:
Crazy Colors is an endurance based rhythmic game. Tap colors to ascend the spire. How many steps can you reach? Challenge your friends, record your games and share your big plays ! Fulfill the swag bar with good inputs for some easy time. At the opposite, too many bad inputs and the boss gets closer to you. Be careful !
4 difficulty levels for everyone ! Will you dare the impossible mode?

name: Desert Rush
description: Each mode offers hours of gameplay and free entertainment for you and your friends.

name: Creep Shock
description: Tap to jump the creep. Time jumps to just right. Avoid falling into the void.

name: 3D Knife
description: "3D Knife" is a 3D arcade to test your reflex and patience. It is mini, beautiful and addictive.Lots of knives can be unlocked. Easy to learn: shoot knife to the wood planet while don't hit other knives. Hard to master: you should take the right chance!

name: Rocket Cars
description:
The creators of Touchgrind Skate2, Touchgrind BMX and Mr. Crab now bring you the breathtaking and extremely addictive car racing game Rocket Cars.
Strap in and rocket through the offroad Desert tracks, boost through the picturesque Wooden landscape and then blow your opponents away in the challenging Copper world. Upgrade your cars and compete against increasingly difficult ai cars in 60+ levels and prove that you have what it takes to win.

name: Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend
description: Play the overwhelming 'Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend' and unleash your divine and dark powers! You are the mighty Demigod, who possesses both the power of angels and demons. You, who had all your powers taken away by the Archangel Michael and the Archdemon Lucifer while trying to conquer the heavens... Now, regain your angelic and demonic powers and embark on your revenge..!

name: Math Be Nimble: Brain Training
description:
You can keep your brain sharp no matter what age or math level you are - with Math Be Nimble! It is great brain exercise and helps you get quicker, faster, and stronger with math. Elevate the mind!
Choose your color and quickly solve problems to earn awards and reach goals while improving your mathematical skill and your cognitive focus and attention. Includes addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, order of operations, sequences, basic algebra, and more!
Math Be Nimble makes math fun and allows players of all levels to practice core mathematics skills - playing a few quiz rounds a day will help you learn to think quickly with math and increase your problem solving ability.
This brain game is challenging, but you can do it! Strengthen your core math skills, starting now!
So what are you waiting for? Download Math Be Nimble today and start improving your math skills one color at a time! Great math practice for Kids AND Adults ñ it is for everyone! Play together and help each other excel at math.
Teachers, students, homeschool - give this quiz game a try. You will be impressed with how well this math game works. 3rd grade math, 4th grade math, 5th grade math and up - Junior High Math or Middle School Math, even High School math students will benefit from the unique combination of quick calculations and mental problem solving. More real math progress in just fractions of the time! Perfect STEM and MESA resource - a focused learning tool.
Get mentally fit and focused with the arithmetic and algebra basics. The fast thinking in this brain game is excellent training for all testing and exam prep, including standardized math tests and homeschool equivalency tests.
Increase your speed, attention, and focus, while helping to elevate the mind skills needed to succeed in more difficult material like algebra, calculus, physics, etc - all are based on these core math basics!

name: Conde
description:
Imagine connecting source to the receiver using only 3 blocks - is that so simple? Not at all. Check your creativity with this simple, clear but demanding puzzle game.
Try solving all 42 uniquely designed levels and become convinced that Conde is a brilliant puzzle game which scales incredibly well.

name: Tappy Dig: Virtual Pet Fox Game
description:
Tappy is about to go on an underground expedition and needs your help to guide him through the depths of Earth. Many mysteries await Tappy in this fun and exciting adventure. Download Tappy Dig now and start exploring!
As you explore, be sure to collect as much fruit as you can. Also beware of snakes, bats and ghosts. They want to ruin your expedition! But don't worry, you can count with amazing power ups to help you get through any trouble!

name: Hexuma
description: Hexuma is an exciting puzzle game for iPhone and iPad. Start exercising your brain today ! This is how it is played: start at the green tile and select connecting tiles to construct a calculation and it's outcome. Finish with the red tile and make sure the calculation and it's outcome are correct. Earn bonus points for finishing the game within the bonus time. If you are stuck, use a hint.

name: Simple Monster Hunter
description: Beat powerful monsters. Step by step to become a hunter. Beat monsters to get the materials, forging super equipment by materials. More than 100 items to explore and forging.

name: Andromeda Overdrive
description: Reach for the stars and high scores in 80s retro inspired synthwave infused endless arcade!

name: Kiss Rock City: Be A Rockstar
description: Who doesn’t want to be a rock star? There’s only one problem: you don’t have enough money and you clash with your band over every decision. Just about to give up, you meet the super famous and glorious band members of KISS. What follows is a stardom adventure to form the next best rockband – and Kiss offers to help you!

name: Color DJ
description:
Visually ever changing fast action music game with a retro style that is easy on the eyes.
Align notes perfectly, rack up combos and beat your friends at the leaderboard!
Three levels of difficulty, to really test your skills!

name: Continuum 01
description:
Continuum - Try to navigate through an endless and immersive combination of color, geometry, and music.
Continuum is a lightweight and simple game where you move around in different directions to avoid swarms of never-ending obstacles that fly right towards you. The game requires focus and fast-reaction, test and see how far you can journey into the continuum.

name: Meow Meoww
description: Help the cat find more fish.

name: Beat Rush
description:
Unlock unique characters for more fun, and level up for more challenges!
Beat Rush is your new addiction! With this brand new beat-based action platform game, you will challenge your skills and see what you’re capable of.
The gameplay is as simple as one touch jumps and hops. You just need to rush forward in tune with the amazing beats the game offers. Dance your fingers to the adventurously good music.

name: Beasts of Steel
description: Beasts of Steel is a semi-realistic WWII game that combines FPS and Strategy where you can battle solo or online. Experience intense combat as an infantryman, tank crew, or take to the skies as a pilot. Unleash chaos and dominate the battlefield!

name: Bertie the Stableboy
description: Help Bertie the stableboy find his way out of difficult situations he unwittingly started in this modern take on the adventure game genre. There are many paths to success, making each playthrough unique. Help Bertie on his journey to becoming the hero of the kingdom, whether he wants to or not.

name: Block_Up
description: An action-packed two-player local-coop 2D puzzle platformer with a focus on teamwork. Use one player's ability to place blocks and the other's ability to break them to create a path to your goal while escaping the rising lava from below!

name: BloodFlood
description: BloodFlood is a 2D Action-Platformer where you battle your way through a deadly infestation. Explore to uncover hidden secrets and grow to become the perfect killing machine.

name: Adventure Story
description: Play the role of the Adventure Guild President of the Magic World. Manage and utilize every resource at hand. Dig out legendary stories from various regions and spread your guild name throughout the entire empire. Finally, obtain powerful artifacts hidden around the world.

name: Campfire Stories : Episode 1
description: Embark on an enchanting narrative-driven adventure across two worlds. Explore, solve puzzles, and save your family in this mild action platformer. Vibrant visuals inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Chaos Crafters
description: Learn, craft and test spells on any element of the game! Solve puzzles or fight enemies alone or in co-op. Be careful, your friends are not immune to your magic and one wrong move could cause total chaos.

name: Coke Bugs
description: A hallucinatory bender of a late night road trip sketched in nervous lines of arcade action and exploration.

name: Buhei
description: Dive into our action-packed Twin Stick Party Shooter! Grab your friends and engage in explosive multiplayer battles, whether you're playing right next to them on the couch or from a distance.

name: Brews & Bastards
description: Brews & Bastards is a chaotic co-op dungeon crawler for 1-4 players, overflowing with action-packed combat, magical brews and outlandish tavern games. Select from a group of distinct heroes and blast your way through hordes of drunken demons in search of the stolen Brew Stone.

name: Broken Life
description: Broken Life is a 2D point-and-click adventure that explores deep emotions caused by war. You will shape the story with your decisions, solve puzzles and discover various secrets. Broken Life is a solo project inspired by real experiences of living through war.

name: Blue Ridge Hunting
description: Blue Ridge Hunting is a horror game where you and up to 2 friends investigate, document, and hunt cryptids in the Appalachian Mountains of eastern America. Based on real sightings, phenomena, and legends from the region.

name: Bounty Hunters
description: Fight in a top down 2d shooter adventure with resource gathering / bullet heaven/hell mechanics.

name: Creature Battle Simulator
description: Forge an army of creatures to defeat your opponents in epic battles across distant lands! Duel against your friends online, or conquer the campaign to unlock new parts that upgrade your creatures' stats and abilities. Will you emerge victorious?

name: Crimson Crisis
description: Embrace the chaos… Battle aliens, shoot guns and, above all else, survive to work anotherday in Crimson Crisis, a sci-fi action-roguelite set in a post-apocalyptic universe.

name: Ctrl+Alt+Destroy
description: The year 2000 is right around the corner. Do you think your CPU can survive Y2K?

name: Das Geheimnis von Lakeshore
description: A 2D Point and Click Adventure in Pixel Art

name: Descentia
description: We fused card games and open-world rpg together to make the best single player open world deckbuilder we could. Build your party with different races, craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, complete the quests and get ready for a breathtaking adventure

name: Delicards: A Delicious Card Game
description: Imagine being a chef at a restaurant, but instead of enduring the heat of the kitchen, you're using trading cards portraying recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards. Compete, Earn, Grow and Collect cards from all over the world and become #1 Kard Chef.

name: Draco and the Seven Scales
description: Discover the mysteries of the great ocean in Draco and The Seven Scales! Explore dungeons, collect items, and fight scallywags on land and on the seven seas.

name: Eon Rush
description: Eon Rush - a real-time action RPG that combines the best of endgame PvE and PvP thrills, skipping the filler and getting straight into the fun. Players dive into a variety of trials, including taking down colossal monsters, competing in challenging gauntlets, and engaging in heart-pounding battles.

name: Evelynn
description: "Evelynn" is an adventure game that tells the story of two little girls, Lynn and Eve, on a travel adventure in an incredible amusement park. With the company and hard work of the two, can they successfully leave this unknown amusement park...

name: Evotactics
description: Evotactics is a tactical third person shooter with extremely destructible environments and an emphasis on stealth. Knock out lights, destroy walls, infiltrate, and complete objectives across multiple environments.

name: Fate of Aruna
description: A science fiction and high fantasy role playing game which takes place amid the ruins of a shattered planet.

name: Enigmatic Worlds
description: Explore strange and abstract worlds filled with equally unusual but deadly beings of many types. Enigmatic Worlds is an FPS inspired by obscure retro-styled FPS games and Amiga games.

name: Grin Zone: Fun House
description: Step into the Grin Zone Daycare after hours – stay hidden from Grin, the playful yet unusual daycare mascot. Will you find your way out? Discover the secrets within this intriguing adventure.

name: I Am Short
description: It's time to step into their tiny little shoes just to see how hard life can be for someone so short.

name: HoverCraft
description: HoverCraft combines vehicle crafting and base-building. Play solo or team up, create unique hovercrafts, explore a large world for resources, refine them into valuable goods for higher profits, and upgrade your base. Defeat enemies guarding rare resources and keep your base safe!

name: Golf by the Way
description: A fast-paced real-time mini-golf party game with no stroke count! Play as an actual golfer in real-time and go smack your friends’ golf ball or even your friends themselves.

name: Flips¿de
description: Flips¿de is an RPG where Sam and her roommates are getting ready to move out of their apartment, but the night before they leave, a mysterious leak leads to a strange world with even stranger people. Can Sam navigate this world, fix the leak, and get her security deposit back?

name: Fighting cop
description: “Fighting cop " is an exciting VR shooting game that gives you the experience of becoming a hero of the entire city. In this city, gang criminals are prevalent, and you are a rare sharpshooter in the police community. Your mission is to combat criminals and protect the safety of citizens.

name: Immune Simulator Type Z
description: In the game "Immune Simulator," the world is losing to zombies. The protagonist finds a computer with historical records of conflicts. Altering data changes the real-world balance, affecting her companions. Is it a divine salvation or devilish trap? Unravel the hidden secrets to find out.

name: Jacob's Quest: Voyage
description: The quest continues in Jacob's Quest : Voyage! Join Kaiden and Jacob on their voyage across the sea islands on thier search for legendary treasure. A grim plot unfolds...

name: Life Museum
description: A side-scrolling puzzle game in line style. You take on the role of an office worker who, after working day after day, decides to explore the city. Play with keyboard or Xbox controller.

name: Light of Hope: The Redeemer
description: In light of hope, you are tasked with exploring awe inspiring locations, solving ancient puzzles left behind by those who came before. Choose your style, equipped abilities, outfits, weapons and more, as you solve a mystery that only you can reveal.

name: Locura
description: Locura is a first-person immersive horror game. It is a thrilling journey into the unknown. Prepare for moral ambiguity where the line between light and darkness blurs.

name: UnReaMod
description: Experience Lumina Leap: Leap to the beat of neon through dazzling levels.Master the jumps, shine on the leaderboards.Dive into the light action!

name: Micro Rogue
description: Venture into the minimalist gauntlet of Micro Rogue, a 2D top-down action roguelike where your hero auto-attacks. Shape your journey with strategic upgrades, face off against a variety of foes, and see how far you can get. Fun meets strategy in this reinvented dungeon dash!

name: Mithronia: Tower Wars
description: Mithronia Tower War is a tower defense game enriched with rogue-like features. You'll construct towers and utilize abilities tailored to your preferences. Protect the mystical quartet of ancient trees, with each tree representing a sacred element - fire, water, earth, and air - brought to life.

name: Modulor
description: A perma-death action rogue-like FPS, where you get gun modules, create crazy combinations and bulid a unique gun every run to shoot through procedurally generated dungeons and slay bosses.

name: My Father's House
description: My Father's House is a first-person indie survival horror game. The father’s old mansion becomes a maze of nightmares when the secrets of the past are released. Survive, save resources, solve puzzles and stay in the shadows. Ingenuity and tactics are your only way to escape.

name: My Legend of Immortal Cultivation
description: Immortal cultivation hanging game, with a rich system, experience the world of immortal cultivation

name: Nini Ninja's Great Escape
description: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers.

name: Ooze: The Great and Powerful
description: Ooze: The Great and Powerful - is a puzzle platformer without the ability to jump. In this adventure, you will learn the story of classic monsters who are trying to get along with each other by playing for the Ooze Cube guarding the dungeon.

name: Operation Noogy
description: Dive into a rhythmic shooting range adventure where precision meets melody. Unlock diverse firearms, ascend the ranks, and groove to the beats in this captivating casual shooter. Challenge your aim, reward your skill, and immerse yourself in the ultimate aim-and-groove experience!

name: Novantica
description: Explore the open-world, futuristic city of Novantica in this sci-fi adventure game, traveling back in time, crafting devices, gathering clues, and solving puzzles to untangle the plot behind a mysterious event that has damaged critical systems across the city.

name: NotificationCat VR
description: NotificationCat VR is a mobile phone message notification sync Utility allows you to forward notification messages from Android or iOS devices to VR Display notification messages such as notification titles, contents, etc. without taking off your VR headset.

name: Phantom Cell
description: Step into the shoes of a fearless FBI agent on a high-stakes mission to dismantle an insidious ultranationalist cult in this intense third-person shooter, "Phantom Cell."

name: Pew Pew Crew!
description: Your crew is your currency. Decide carefully which crew members you want to “fire”.

name: Project Survival
description: Project Survival is an anime fantasy survival-crafting, monster taming, open world adventure game that you can enjoy solo or with friends. Embark on an epic journey in a thrilling fantasy survival game that will push your skills and instincts to their limits.

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter - Collector's Edition
description: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?

name: Sim the Sand
description: "Sim The Sand" is an exhilarating adventure game, blending low-poly TPS visuals and music to immerse players in the enigmatic atmosphere of the micro world. Join Sim, a grain of sand, on a perilous journey to reunite with its family amidst danger and challenges.

name: Side by Size
description: Side by Size is a puzzle game where taking damage and healing changes the puzzle layout. Purposefully get hurt to open the way to the exit in 100 hand crafted puzzles!

name: Shutdown
description: Engage in heart-pounding top-down shooter action as a skilled operative fighting against powerful mega-corporations in a dystopian future. Unleash a barrage of futuristic weaponry, master tactical combat, and liberate humanity from the clutches of oppression in Shutdown.

name: Shipwrecked
description: Fight your way to establish yourself as the greatest pirate in a newly discovered archipelago, battling numerous other pirate factions and navies along the way in strategic turn-based combat, all while managing your own resources and armada. Crown the true king of pirates in your own way.

name: Time For Revenge
description: Time For Revenge is a co-op survival horror game for 1-6 player. Get your revenge from the Chef. But be careful, Chef can't see well but he can sense your smell very well. You need to solve the puzzles and complete the tasks to save the children. Escape from the town before Chef gets you.

name: Spelling Spree
description: It's a word game! It's a team-based shooter! Battle it out in the arena to collect the most letter tiles, then ascend to an overhead view and play words on the arena floor to capture territory for your team. Spelling words on a game board, in a fast-paced shooter, with a gamepad? Yes!

name: Square City Builder
description: Build the small pixel city of your dreams! From classic city-building games, Square City Builder offers various ways to customize your gameplay, from constructing houses, farms, or roads to facing random events. In this game, you're in control!

name: Stellar Tunes
description: One button rhythm game.

name: The Galaxy Rider
description: Welcome to The Galaxy Rider! Cruise the cosmos as a space taxi driver! Your mission? Get rich while carrying passengers between planets. Ready for an out-of-this-world ride?

name: The Barnacle Squad
description: The Barnacle Squad is a tactical turn-based RPG set in the slimy, tentacle-infested waters of a flooded necropolis. Choose from 12 distinct character classes as you manage your squad of mercenaries rowing through a labyrinth of nautical fiends.

name: The Last General
description: Lead your army through raging conflicts in this massive RTS modern war game. Execute tactics and conquer the resources you need to achieve your goals. Take the enemy territory, perform assassinations, lead insurrections, rescue your stranded troops and much more, in millions of different missions.

name: Thetawave
description: Thetawave is a physics-based space shooter with procedurally generated levels, diverse foes, and distinct characters.

name: The Rabbit Haul
description: The Rabbit Haul is a tower defense farming game with roguelite elements where you grow a healthy ecosystem of plants that yield crops during the day and that will help defend your farm from the Trash Panda Posse at night.

name: They Come In Waves
description: Forge your path through unending zombie swarms! Craft inferno-spewing flamethrowers & explosive rocket launchers for ultimate undead domination. How long will you survive?

name: The War of 2022
description: Enlist, fight, and decide how loyal you are to your country in this modern military war novel!

name: Two Putt
description: Two Putt is a mini golf party game where you control multiple golfers at the same time. Help Komakai and Kyoichi conquer 100+ courses and 20+ wacky mini games to become mini golf champions!  Hit the links solo, or grab some friends (1-4 players)

name: Towerbolt
description: Towerbolt is a fast paced vertical platformer set in the year 239X. Race to the top of a cyberpunk Megatower while outrunning lethal security lasers on every floor!

name: Upbound
description: You have fallen into a pit, and the only way out is up. Can you climb your way up without falling?

name: Unstable Scientific
description: Rescue scientists, build your own lab, and discover the secret of Toromiro Island in this intricate pixel art platformer!

name: Vigilante Racer
description: Race across walls, ceilings, and cloud-piercing tracks in a world where sci-fi hover tech rules. Test gravity extremes in The Pit, be the hero in City racing by stopping criminals and bring speed to another level in Skyway. Follow a story for the first chapter's release.

name: Wreckage
description: A classic car combat game set in a post-apocalyptic sunny south Florida. Fast-paced gameplay, a wide variety of vehicles and weapons to choose from, and killer stories for each and every driver.

name: Willow Guard
description: Willow Guard is a single player story-driven fantasy RPG that combines dungeon-crawling action gameplay with a choice-based interactive fiction.

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball Season 1 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bomber Crew: Skin Pack
description: Need a new look for your Bomber, but about to send your Crew off for another perilous run? Don’t fear, the Bomber Skin Pack is here!

name: Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar - Bannermen Pack
description: Let your enemies on the battlefield know what they are dealing with. The free Bannermen DLC for Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar adds four new and fully-animated units to the game: including the Roman Aquilifer and the Gallic Hornblower.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Boruto Uzumaki (Karma)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Boruto Uzumaki (Karma)!

name: RainyDay
description: Story The main character was taking shelter from the rain at a bus stop when it suddenly started to rain. Then a soaking wet woman appears to take shelter from the rain as well. While having a casual conversation, the two get closer to each other. And then...

name: Amorphous
description: Amorphous is a 4v1 multiplayer experience where one player takes control of the elusive shape-shifting slime, seeking to consume and contaminate various locations across space and time. Meanwhile, the team of 4 relentless Cleaners unite and attempt to eradicate the ever-evolving threat.

name: One Tap
description: "One Tap" is a high-octane first-person shooter game that delivers an immersive and competitive gaming experience. It's all about the thrill of the game, the strategy, and the skill. The unique twist? You get to choose an in-game asset with special abilities that can turn the tide of the battle. The special characters in the game are digital assets or "NFT" stored using blockchain technology.

name: Beep Bap The Beep Boop
description: Beep Bap The Beep Boop is a 3D platformer inspired by Spyro, Banjo and Zelda! Explore colorful worlds and talk to a variety of charming NPCs! Use your surroundings to aid in combat & use shields to block and parry enemy attacks!

name: EdelSuche
description: EdelSuche is a Rockman-style-doujin-ish-action-platformer game where you play as Cecilia Wonderwand, a mage apprentice who finds herself in need to save the world from "The Rot".

name: Hot Job 94'
description: Hot Job 94 is a 3D action platformer inspired by the early 2000's GameCube games such as Sonic Adventure and Super Mario Sunshine. Control 5 different characters with unique attributes like speed, flight, shooting, and combat.

name: Mekanikko
description: Mekanikko is an RPG that takes place in the world of modern steampunk. Explore the world of automatons, as weird things are always about to happen. Meet wacky characters with each of their own story tell. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

name: Sonic 3000
