description: A fast-paced Sonic fan game with an improved moveset and no speedcap.

name: Sonic Colors VN
description: Sonic Colors VN is a remake of Sonic Colors DS in a Visual Novel format using the Ren'Py game engine. This project bridges the gap between all versions of the tale, stringing their plot threads together.

name: Sonic Colors Demastered
description:
Sonic Colors Demastered is a 2D reimagining of Sonic Colors for the Nintendo Wii and Nintendo DS. The game features gameplay inspired by the Sonic Rush series and a fully original level design and soundtrack.

Join Sonic, Tails, and a colorful cast of aliens to put a stop to Eggman’s plans for interstellar domination! Use Sonic’s signature suite of abilities, including the boost, grind, and homing attack, to make your way through exhilarating, high-speed 2D platforming challenges!

name: Sparkster PC
description: A reimagined version of the Genesis version of Sparkster that aims to create something new and exciting with its existing ideas and assets.

name: Say Something Positive About
description:
The game where players have to say something positive about ANYTHING!

A player writes a prompt, the other players have to come up with something positive to say about it!

name: Pokémon: Burning Lotus
description: The game takes place in a new region called Lotus, a region that is filled with Pokémon from every previous generation, including new species as well. You take control as either a male or female protagonist, and the region has eight gym leaders who are all returning leaders from previous games.

name: Pokémon Mino
description: At the beginning of their journey, the trainer and sailor go to the Hishout Dungeon to see the very rare Pokémon, Graykid. When Team Digital arrives has a plan to steal the Pokémon, Graykid. Even though who's gonna stop Team Digital? Their good friends Damian and Skyla are the adventurous trainers in a whole wide world.

name: Break Arts III
description: Freely customize your own robots to win high-speed matches! With the brand new Co-op Mode and Diorama Mode, this game is a fresh new addition to the series.

name: Sonic Test Labs
description:
Here at Hedgehog Testing Inc., we take the matter of rogue and spikey rodents very seriously. They're a threat and a menace to society!

So what have we decided to do? Take matters into our own hands by capturing these creatures and studying them to their fullest extent. All sponsored by G.U.N. of course!

name: The Bowyage
description:
The Bowyage is a low fantasy platformer inspired by the NES Castlevania games, where you control Yew Bowman, a member of the low nobility and a longbowman, in his journey of conquests against his other two elder brothers.
Yew, lacking resources, figured that he needs to gain power to fend off against his two more powerful brothers, so with his trusty bow and arrow and his loyal army, he marches towards the path of conquest.

name: Monolith O Pesadelo
description: First person horror, Simple short game, look for keys, unlock passages. Be in an unknown location with a Dark atmosphere. In each phase there will be a different challenge, survive and advance while you try not to get caught. Avoid Scares.

name: Roman Empire Simulator
description: Conquer, defend, and rise! Dive into the grandeur of ancient Rome in this gripping blend of Tower Defense and war strategy. Transform your humble settlement into history's mightiest empire. Defend against ferocious armies and expand your dominion over Europe and Africa. Ready your arrows and flames!

name: Mind Puzzle 2023
description: Mind Puzzle 2023: Dive into a world where physics reigns and every level offers endless possibilities. With just rectangles and circles at your disposal, discover your unique solution in this riveting casual game. Challenge the usual, embrace the extraordinary!

name: Hop N' Drop
description: Guide Hoppins on his way down and endless series of platforms. Tap to jump but make sure you time it just right. Hop N' Drop is a simple, charming, and cute one-tap endless game that will have you playing for hours. What ever you do don't let Hoppins touch the spikes or it's game over.

name: Fight Bingo
description:
Five lines Bingo fight.
You can play with a powerful AI.
Five lines to win!

name: Rocky Wings
description:
Discover Rocky Wings: An endless airplane arcade game that challenges your piloting skills!
You are the pilot in command in this casual fly-and-wreck-a-plane-simulator. Hop into the cockpit of the Checko 120 (your first own airplane), collect 12 more aircraft and unlock 13 challenging achievements. Fire up the engine and off you go. Who needs checklists, anyway?

name: Save The Toast!
description:
Flappy bird has nothing on this toast-chomping monster! Hone in your skills and take the toast challenge! Help this little toast monster find his toast!

This game includes 10 levels of action-packed adventure! Play in the bright happy sun, as well as a cloudy rainy day. Change the weather as the decade, because "Save the Toast" Now includes 3 never before seen Vintage levels.

name: Satebo's Word Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Miners X
description: The long-awaited sequel to the #1 rated Xbox Live Indie Game is not here yet, but it will be (Believe). Classic FPS gunplay with awesome parkour. Online, 4 player Splitscreen! Block-based destructible maps. Vehicles. Zombies. PVP Infection: Devour your victims, get new zombie powers!

name: ICode Stem Universe
description: Dive into a VR universe of knowledge! Explore space, engineer inventions, and journey through Earth's history. Discover, learn, and be amazed.

name: Skeletons Uprising
description: Play alone or grab up to 4 friends and survive wave-based rounds and special enemies. Collect parts, Craft special items, and Explore the maps to unlock secrets and increase your chances of survival. Have fun and stay alive.

name: Hover Shooting Defence
description: Aliens have invaded for Earth's resources. They dominated nature and made them attack mankind. Humanity on the verge of extinction has gathered the last of its strength and developed a superconducting hovertank that can stand against them. Now our counterattack begins.

name: Blue Cradle: Signifie
description: A novel game with a fully voiced story about everyday or extraordinary stories.

name: Ultradian
description: Ultradian is an intense JRPG adventure featuring turn-based combat, Survival Horror elements, and resource management. You must escape the war-torn town of Lgov within 24 hours before a devastating nuclear bomb is unleashed! But beware, falling asleep means certain death!

name: LastSafeZone
description: How will you live in a chaotic world? I have to explore outside anyway

name: Unexpected Visitors
description: Step back in time to the 1950s and immerse yourself in a chilling tale shrouded in mystery in "Unexpected Visitors." Play as Barbara Clark, a housewife whose picturesque life takes a nightmarish turn when she returns home to find her children and babysitter mysteriously vanished.

name: The Adventures of Bunny and Pig
description: Narrative game where Bunny heals an injured Pig and then together they fight against monsters. Psychological healing theme with a cute art style.

name: Exit the Backrooms
description: Embark on a journey through 8 meticulously crafted levels that blur the line between the mundane and the surreal. Each environment, designed to captivate the senses, pushes the boundaries of what you thought you knew.

name: FolcDark: Part I
description: FolcDark: Part I is the sequel to the prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Synthwave Ascension
description: Survive and fight off killer robots as you grow stronger and stronger! Synthwave Ascension is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements and synthwave themes.

name: Deadpoint
description: "Deadpoint" is an engaging third-person survival game set in an apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Players take on the role of a resourceful scavenger, tasked with navigating the dangerous landscape and ensuring their survival amid the hordes of undead.

name: Three Random Archives
description: In this action-adventure game play a collection of three short stories all confined within a single package. Shoot your way to survival, platform your way to victory, and explore a distant but familiar city! Just whatever you do, stay off circus grounds!!! (It's private property.)

name: Clash of Blades
description: Clash of Blades is an online multiplayer gladiatorial real-time sword fighting VR game with a special kill determination system - dismantling of enemy's body modules, creating a unique and groundbreaking gaming experience, and turning your dream of wielding a sword at home into reality!

name: Excalibur's Swordstone Idle Forge
description: Pull legendary swords from stones, upgrade your forge, trade with factions, and craft artifacts in this idle clicker game of medieval mastery.

name: Woodland Isle
description: Explore the enchanting world of Woodland Isle, a captivating exploration game that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through a lush, mysterious island. Uncover hidden locations, from ancient campsites to majestic trees and the remains of giants.

name: Saga of Weil
description: Saga of Weil is an old school side scrolling adventure with some souls-like style combat

name: Elysian Echoes
description: Elysian Echoes is a traditional, hand crafted souls-like metroidvania with a twist. Take possession of your fallen enemies bodies and unveil your cosmic destiny as you untangle Gaia's turmoil. Adapt to the varied and difficult encounters; learn and use your enemies' moves against them or die trying.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Hollowback
description: Sin descripción

name: Sakura School Love
description: The background of the game is an interesting story that happened in the small town of Sakura on the campus. You can also learn more knowledge and experience various daily activities, waiting for players to explore in the game.

name: Girl Travels Forest of Dream
description: Let's start the journey with the girl who picks up machete and eats grilled fish! please remember. What is needed to save the world is 'recipes to try', 'border privet', and 'balanced diet'. Needless to say, the smell of cat paws and the warmth of loved ones!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Bassline
description: Sin descripción

name: Acceleration of Suguri: Y-Edition
description: Acceleration of Suguri Y-Edition is a fan-made remake of Acceleration of SUGURI. The speed has been cranked up, gameplay and visuals have been polished, along with a more balanced cast and rollback netcode!

name: Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble DX
description: Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble DX is a fan-made remake of the flash game Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble.

name: Cave Story: The Desolate
description: Cave Story: The Desolate is a fangame based off of the Cave Story Beta.

name: Bub's Big Blowout!
description:
Bub and his friends seem to have found themselves lost in a strange new world! Everything is so familiar, yet so different! Will you be able to help Bub and his friends find their way home?

Welcome to "Bub's Big Blowout!", A 3D reimagining of the Bubble Bobble arcade game! Here you can jump, blow bubbles, and burst baddies as bub or one of his 3 friends! Collect fruit, Extend Bubbles, and other collectibles for the best possible score!

name: FNaF World: Outplay
description: FNaF World: Outplay is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan game about to recreate the FNaF World from an RPG format to a Sonic-like platformer format with fast-paced gameplay.

name: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's
description: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's is an augmented reality mobile game developed by Youtooz. It was released to coincide with the release of Youtooz's Security Breach wave figures.

name: Ivaxion
description: Ivaxion is a turn based tactics RPG focused heavily on its strategic gameplay with no luck based elements.

name: Edd the Duck
description: A Game Boy game was developed by Beam Software but never released. An altered version of their game Baby T-Rex, the game was pulled from distribution just before release when the BBC revoked the license but not before it received a negative review in Game Zone magazine.

name: Guitar Hero III Mobile: Song Pack 1
description:
Guitar Hero III Song Pack 1 (Stylized GH3SP1) is a Standalone version of the Guitar Hero III Mobile Port of the game. This version came with new songs and achievements maintaining the same graphics.
The game was developed by Hands On and published by Activision.

name: Pipe Dream
description: SAM Coupé port of Pipe Dream.

name: Sudoku Plug & Play
description: A plug and plug Sudoku game by The New York Times.

name: Yomas
description: Yomas - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. As you progress through the game, you will encounter new weapons, potions, and coins. All this is required to destroy enemies and bosses!

name: Underground Gnome
description: Underground gnome - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Destroy enemies on the location and complete the set goal to go further along the storyline and collect bonuses.

name: All in Pairs
description: A warehouse worker's day can't be boring. Every day things are scattered on the table in front of you.

name: Bowave
description: An addictive game in which the player takes on the role of an elite archer who is tasked with protecting the tower from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Ultimate Tennis
description:
Ultimate Tennis is the most complete mobile sport game ever! Enjoy thrilling gameplay, beautiful graphics and pack of action!
Ultimate Tennis offers you a tweaked version of the familiar finger-swipe tennis gameplay combined with a detailed element that gives you near to unlimited options for improving and customizing your character(s). To provide a more action-packed experience the tennis rules have been adjusted slightly, resulting in fast-paced gameplay and shorter but much more exciting matches!
On top of that the game offers great graphics and visualizations to give you one of the most visually realistic tennis experiences to date.

name: Nodes of Yesod: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
Welcome to the 25th Anniversary Edition of Nodes Of Yesod!
Guide Astro Charlie through various moon caverns, defeating many monsters on your way. Collect 8 Alchiems to complete your quest!!!
In this enhanced version of the classic 8-bit platform game, you will find the complete original game, along with an enhanced version containing new graphics, new gameplay features, new audio, music remixes, and more!

name: Inertix
description:
A unique minimal puzzle that will satisfyingly tease your brain.
Play Inertix and embark on a timing puzzle journey filled with exquisite mechanics that will put your synchronization skills to the ultimate test! All while relaxing your senses.

name: Bar Oasis 2
description: Enjoy the continued story of Bar Oasis in the visual novel styled story mode as Vic returns from Hong Kong in pursuit of his love interest, only to find that Boss had left everything to a rookie girl and did a runner on the job and left the bar to a new girl, Carla. As Vic tries to undo the damages that the bar suffered during his absence, more people join the ranks of regulars at Bar Oasis.

name: Burning Bubbles Lab
description: Classic bubble shooter game, reinterpreted for iOS. Comes with thousands of levels.

name: Joining Hands 2
description: Joining Hands 2 is intuitive and easy to play; drag and drop the Peablins so that everyone is holding hands. The level of challenge increases as the Peablins get more hands and new types of Peablins are introduced. Try to collect all the stars from each level too!

name: Swipe Link
description:
Swipe Link is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.
Strategically remove all linked blocks.

name: Cabal: Return of Action
description: Enter the epic world of Nevareth in Cabal: Return of Action, the highly anticipated mobile game from the creators of Cabal Online. With over 30 million players online and an MMORPG (Multi Massively Online Role Playing Game) lineage that spans more than 15 years, Cabal: Return of Action is one of the 3D RPG pioneers to feature fast-paced combo-driven combat in an immersive stylized MMO.

name: DotQuest
description:
DotQuest is an epic tale of a brave man on a quest to save the world from Satan and his forces of evil. The game features a large number of items and skills, all there to aid you in the battle against Satan.
On your way you will be accompanied with a party allowing you to devise different strategies during combat. Each character levels up individually and so do his weapon skills the more he uses a specific weapon.
DotQuest is an old school 2D RPG (Role Playing Game).
Recent RPGs just focus on graphics and tend to be too complicated.
DotQuest tries to break from the majority of modern RPGs by being simple and easy to understand.

name: Cluck In Traffic: Cars Royale!
description: Avoid moving cars at all costs and collect as much food as possible. Watch out though, the cars begin slow but soon get faster.

name: Nyan Cat: Candy Match
description: Nyan Cat: Candy Match takes your favourite switch and match game mechanics and nyans them up to an intergalactic level. Are you a candy enthusiast? We got you covered! Do you love cats? Good news: cats love you too! Fan of rainbows? We got 'em! Always wanted to be more Nyan? Look no further!

name: Ollie's Arcade
description: Relive fond memories of your favorite classic arcade or electronic handheld games! A fun collection of retro-styled mini games that are both challenging and simple to play.

name: Pirate's Boom Boom
description: This visually striking & super-fun "Arcade" Shooter will challenge newcomers and pros alike! Join our heroes, Pirate and Crow on their tiny wooden boat to battle Ghost Ships, Kamikazes, Armadas and the most dangerous Fleets of the high seas!

name: Club Boss
description:
Club Boss is an offline football management / soccer management simulation game, where you create your own football club and lead them to glory.
Build your own football club in Club Boss, the new fast-paced addictive football manager game. Enjoy the Football Chairman-like gameplay and the Football Manager style stats and details.
Start from the bottom of a domestic football league and develop, finance and negotiate your football club to the top of the football pyramid.

name: Storage Auction
description: Enter virtual storage unit auctions. Look inside when the door is raised and decide how high you will bid. Touch items and containers in your purchased rooms to empty them and hopefully find treasure instead of junk.

name: Pipeline Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Kagaku na Hatsumei to Hakken no Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Kuru-kuru Puzzle Nihon no Rekishi
description: Sin descripción

name: I want to monopolize the older sister!
description: Sin descripción

name: Yurutto Manaberu Seiza to Shinwa
description: Sin descripción

name: Zenkoku Ippanjin Joushiki Check
description: Sin descripción

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central - All in Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard - Cloud Version: Z Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Superb Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: City Smash 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Luna Rebirth: Floating Island
description: Sin descripción

name: MLB Home Run Derby
description: Sin descripción

name: Gears of War 4 and Halo 5: Guardians Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: It's Hot Pot Time!
description: Take on the Hot Pot Challenge together in co-op or online play for up to 8 players and strive to become the ultimate hot pot champion! Experience the realistic simulation of eating hot pot. Enjoy and relax in an immersive environment. Get your stove ready and savor every moment!

name: Kaleidola
description: Kaleidola is a first-person action puzzle game with a kaleidoscope-inspired twist. Dive into the mind-bending world and unlock powers that transform objects, obstacles, and paths with the click of a button to overcome seemingly impossible dead-ends. Discover what your creativity can achieve.

name: Haddie's Pizzeria
description: Extremely realistic cooking simulator. The player has to work in an apartment in modern design, solving different tasks such as cooking pizzas via real-life recipes, meanwhile rethinking life’s transience, the futility of pleasure, and the inevitability of death.

name: Gedonia 2
description: Gedonia 2 is an online coop RPG, which allows up to 4 players to freely explore living open world and build absolutely unique characters. An expanded and improved sequel for RPG Gedonia.

name: Destiny of Immortal
description: Fate of Creation "is a meat pigeon, cultivation of immortals, and storyline game. You accidentally obtained one of the most precious treasures of creation and embarked on the path of cultivating immortals.

name: Heart Attack
description: Heart Attack is an FPS Roguelite game where you survive against waves of security robots. Buy the next-tier weapon and upgrade it as well. Protect a moving vehicle from increasingly powerful and diverse security robots alone or with friends.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Deora II
description: Put yourself in the shoes (or more likely beach sandals) of Vert Wheeler and hop in this fabulous masterpiece from Highway 35 World Race. Ride the wave of success with the legendary Deora II with Wave Rippers livery.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Mattel Dream Mobile
description: Its futuristic design is a piece of history: Mattel Dream Mobile was the first toy car created by Mattel. This stunning bubble-topped convertible looks ready to take off and fill the future of your opponents with broken dreams!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Thanksgiving Pack
description: It's time to say thank you, 3 times, with a triple gift for your collection: Hot Seat, a toilet-on-wheels, to flush the rivals away. Rigor Motor, a die-hard racing coffin for your Death matches and to end with a bang BMW 3.0 CSL Racing!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Bye Focal II
description: You don't see many cars like this around! Especially when they whiz past you at full speed! Bye Focal II will take you to victory in the blink of an eye! So get ready to say “Bye Bye” to your opponents and “Hello” to the finish line!

name: Project 32X: Sonic Mars
description:
Sonic and his friends found out about the Cyberspace and its inhabitants, and Robotnik is using this world to create his empire, now everyone has to try to save the Cyberspace with the power of the Cyber Emeralds.

Project 32X is a fan game that attempts to revive the original Sonic Mars/Sonic 32X project.

name: Block Puzzle Kool
description: Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids. From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

name: Space Battle: Sea Battle
description:
Sirens are wailing, the enemy space fleet is approaching: let the Space Battle begin!
Take control of the command center and coordinate the space defense in your area in Space Battle. Discover enemy spaceships and command the shelling in your sector by determining the correct coordinates, just like in Battleship.

name: Tappy Golf
description: The most easy, fun and addicting golf game you'll ever play! Each hole is procedurally generated. So you'll experience an infinite number of golf holes that are different every time you play! Just tap the screen to stop the aiming arrow. That's it! But careful... the arrow gets faster the better you score.

name: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003
description: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003 is a "very buggy" game developed by Joeveno, where you're Sledge MoreNeo, and you're wandering around a Generic Brazilian Favela because you suddenly appeared there. Heavily inspired by Max Payne, the game has bullet time, an old-school third-person camera, classic 2000s lock aiming, Matrix-styled hand-to-hand combat, rail grinding, and more. It also has a motorcycle.

name: The Wonderful 101
description: Early plans for the game included releasing it on the Wii with existing Nintendo characters, though plans stalled and the game was put on hold. The game concepts were later revived as an original game with new characters for the Wii U and released in 2013.

name: Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff
description: A Tecmo Bowl remake was announced for both the Wii and the Nintendo DS. While the DS received Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff, the Wii version was cancelled in favor with developing and releasing Family Fun Football, a title that was thought to more closely cater to the Wii's casual userbase.

name: Sphere
description: An unannounced game by N-Space discovered in a widespread leak of Nintendo's data in 2021. Described as a Metal Gear Solid type game with a female protagonist. Never released in any capacity, and N-Space closed down in 2016.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Generations
description: Sin descripción

name: Son of the Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadows of the Damned
description: Well after its 2011 Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 release, developer head Goichi Suda noted in passing that the game had started as a Wii game, but that version of the game was cancelled for reasons he would not elaborate on.

name: Scalebound
description: Privately, the game was originally in development for the Wii briefly. A prototype was developed for the Wii shortly after the completion of the original Bayonetta game, first involving Wii remote was used to direct and communicate with dinosaurs as a little girl character. The game transition to an older male protagonist shortly before the prototype was dropped to focus on The Wonderful 101.

name: SBK-08: Superbike World Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: Red Faction: B.E.A.S.T.
description: An entry of the Red Faction series of games being developed exclusively for the Wii's hardware. Publisher THQ's financial troubles caused them to close down developer Locomotive Games, leading to the game's cancellation as well.

name: The Next Big Thing
description: A proposed hybrid video game mixed racing, platforming, and trick performing. The game was cancelled when developers Pandemic Studios could not find a publisher, and the company shutdown shortly afterwards.

name: Metroid Tactics
description: A game pitched by Metroid Prime developers at Retro Studios concluding the release of Metroid Prime 3 as a new direction to head into following the conclusion of the trilogy of Prime games. It was proposed to be similar to the XCOM series of video games that reused assets from the Trilogy games. However, management at Retro Studios rejected the pitch.

name: Medal of Honor: Airborne
description: Originally announced as a cross-generational title that would have two versions - a full-fledged HD version on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and PC platforms, and a second, scaled back version developed for the less powerful hardware of the Wii, PlayStation 2, and original Xbox. The scaled back version was cancelled for all three platforms, Wii included.

name: Machinarium
description: Sin descripción

name: Lucha Libre AAA: Héroes del Ring
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X
description: Sin descripción

name: Gray Matter
description: Sin descripción

name: God: The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Space 2
description: Cancelled Nintendo Wii port of Dead Space 2.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution
description: Sin descripción

name: CCTV
description: The game's premise was to have the player be a security guard tasked with monitoring a CCTV. The game was cancelled when the developers could not find a publisher that supported its unique concept.

name: Superman: Man of Steel
description: Sin descripción

name: The Thing
description: Sin descripción

name: The Thing
description: Sin descripción

name: The Outer Zone: Survival Tactics
description: Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Zone?

name: NBA Live 2000
description: Sin descripción

name: San Francisco Rush: Extreme Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Sea-Doo Hydrocross
description: Sin descripción

name: The Three Stooges
description: Cancelled Game Boy Color port of The Three Stooges.

name: Thrasher Presents: Skate and Destroy
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Hit Football 23
description: Sin descripción

name: Yukkuri My Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Golden Idol Mysteries : Game + DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Untamed Tactics: Humblewood Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Untamed Tactics: Digital Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kiss: Psycho Circus - The Nightmare Child
description: Sin descripción

name: Gekido
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Crisis
description: Sin descripción

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse
description: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse was the cancelled Game Boy Color incarnation of what would eventually become Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Revenge.

name: Occultic;Nine: New World
description: Sin descripción

name: Project CARS
description: A version of Project CARS which would run on lower-end hardware. The PS3 and Xbox 360 ports were cancelled in favor of the PS4 and the Xbox One, but the Wii U version was only cancelled later.

name: 5 Nights at Guillem's
description: Videogame like Five Nights at Freddy's but with the company of Guillem the Frutem and some of his friends.

name: Young Justice: Legacy
description: A port of Young Justice: Legacy for Wii, which was cancelled due to quality issues and low interest from retailers.

name: Seaman 3DS
description: A cancelled Seaman game for the Nintendo 3DS, which was in development by the original creator, Yoot Saito, in a close partnership with Satoru Iwata (president of Nintendo at that time). It was eventually cancelled. After Iwata's passing, Yoot Saito commented about the game and how he regrets not fulfilling this project.

name: Golfing in Aether: Autumn
description: The first free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing autumn colors along with several new levels.

name: Golfing in Aether: Leviathan
description: The third free expansion to Golfing in Aether, adding several new levels.

name: Goblin's Mystic War
description: The game is a story driven action adventure game in an stylized cartoonish world. It is fun to play and a good experience that you will enjoy. Interact with other goblin's solve small puzzles and fight ghosts.

name: Global Conflict: The Trading Card Game
description: Build, battle, and conquer your way to victory in Global Conflict - The Trading Card Game! Assemble decks with strategic precision and engage in fierce turn-based battles against rival factions. Each move and decision will shape the course of the game, offering endless challenges and triumphs.

name: MGCM Combat Edition
description: A secondary creation fighting game which you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "I Am Magicami". There are three basic attack buttons, A, B, and C. Elements for beginners are also substantial. Let's grab the victory with flashy magic using the "Possibility Gauge"!

name: Dashbounce
description: Dashbounce is a 2D Speedrunning Puzzle-Platformer about going fast and intentionally abusing physics quirks! Seek the goal in each level before the clock hits zero - but watch out, you can't jump! You'll have to use your surprising speed and bouncy body to turn every object and obstacle into an advantage!

name: My Virgin Roommate
description: You are a freshman, in love with your roommate. Live through five days at Virginia College and take away her innocence. Mia is waiting for you.

name: Egyptian Ratslap
description: Enjoy a laid-back session of your new favorite card game that mixes the rules of slap jack and more!

name: Plinko: Ball Falling
description: Classic Plinko game with new theme and challenges.

name: Aenigma Game: Storm Hacker
description: Jump on a futuristic hover-ski to drift, boost, leap, dash, sign-ride, and even hack your way through mysterious reality storms on an emotional journey across the stars in this high-speed 3D Action Adventure Platformer with immersive hub worlds and hand painted art.

name: Dear Brother
description: Point and click adventure game series! The game consists of 12 gradually releasing chapters. Mystery and mystical story about young doctor and his family is waiting for you. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the Blake family.

name: Girl Gallery
description: Girl Gallery - relaxing casual puzzle game for adults. Complete levels and expand your gallery collection.

name: Crazy Plus
description:
"Crazy Plus" is a numbers merged puzzle game.
This game provides six modes: Plus One, Match Two, Add Three, Merge Seven, Make Ten and 2N. Each mode has a unique gameplay.

name: Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator
description: Are you ready to experience the thrill of cycling on snowy mountain peaks? Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator invites you to an unforgettable adventure with realistic graphics. Now explore and pedal to the top!

name: Cargobros
description: Cargobros is a co-op game with chaos breeding physic mechanics. You can hook yourself, your cargo and your vehicle in this game. In a world with absolute physic chaos, use your hook to create order! Coming soon...

name: Escape Room: Romy Project
description: Escape Room: Romy Project is a first-person room escape game. Players need to collect clues and solve problems to escape.

name: AfterWar
description: AfterWar is a strategy about Ukraine in July 2024.

name: Jump Like a Grad Student
description: Smith, lingering as a graduate student for 20 years, hears of a rumor about an island where room-temperature superconductors were found. This is his last ray of hope. Help him ascend to the peak of the island and turn his life around. "Jump, Like a Grad Student"

name: Avoid the Police
description: This is a very fun escape game with a touch of parkour in it.

name: Mana Expel
description: Mana Expel is a fast-paced action platformer with stealth elements where in the near future magic has just been discovered, and those who master its power are feared like gods. Infiltrate their reign, be fast and unseen, exploit their own territory, and expel these so-called gods from their throne.

name: Grimoire of Syvnta
description: Use the cards of common creatures to legendary heroes that inhabit Syvnta to fight your opponent. The goal is to defeat your opponent using your spells and units cards to their best potential.

name: Pasture: The Livestock Simulator
description: The weight of your herd rests on your shoulders as you build a cattle empire, set in the Australian Outback.

name: JDM Euphoria
description: Feel the rush of '90s Japanese underground street racing. Trick out and trade cars, pimp your garages, and go head-to-head in sprints and drags. Carve your path to glory and make your mark in this immersive game!

name: Backrooms: Infinite Halls
description: Backrooms: Infinite Halls is a game about investigating and researching the Backrooms, going deeper and deeper down these unending spaces, roaming their halls and avoiding their horrors.

name: Elemental Escape
description: Bullet hell, but kill the bullets instead of dodging them!

name: Avengers Squad
description: "Avengers Squad" is a bullet hell shooting game. You, an unknown avenger, although you have the martial arts secrets passed down from your ancestors, but after all, the disputes in the rivers and lakes make you want to stay away from the fights in the rivers and lakes and wander around~

name: Buti
description: Buti is an RPG currently in development that delves deep into the expansive world of the internet and a little beyond, creating a parallel universe strongly inspired by the 2000s. Here, you assume the role of a unique character and embark on a journey towards online success.

name: Dominant Witches
description: Dominant Witches is a visual interactive story for adults, where the player will study in a magical institution and will perform sexual fetishes with beautiful witches, attractive kitsune, cute vampires and pretty kitsune who live in a castle among the woods.

name: Courier 79
description: Drive across towns and countries and become the elite courier, a courier who delivers cargo in perfect condition ranging from food all the way to contrabands. In this Rogue-like experience you will be forced to show your endurance, skill and speed in order to succeed.

name: Beaten Path
description: Beaten Path is a turn-based, tactical RPG following the story of a mage and her student as they traverse a shattered world, fend off foes, and strategize their way to victory.

name: Live Shiver
description: In this game, YOU are the game, and a popular streamer plays it! Step into the shoes of an evil force in this real-time strategy simulation game. Craft tension, conjure scares, and haunt the streamer to create a symphony of horror. Your goal: Amplify the stream to increase the number of live viewers

name: Arctic's Adventure
description: An action adventure game where you go on a journey to save your missing best friend. Play as Arctic the polar bear and explore the icy north in different ways. Meet new friends, overcome obstacles, and find clues about what happened to your friend.

name: Forge & Fortune
description: Craft weapons, tools, and armor pieces in stunning detail as you fulfill orders from a variety of NPCs. Use VR to hammer, chisel, and mold materials into exquisite creations. Expand your shop, hire assistants, and unlock new techniques with your earnings.

name: Listenbourg
description: Play a sci-fi turn-based strategy game while an AI threat the humanity. A VR experience allowing to discover the famous Listenbourg.

name: Ember the Werefox
description: Resourceful by day, fierce by night; young Ember must survive and redeem the nightmare forest.

name: Nasty Rogue 2
description: An open-world crafting roguelike voxel based where everything is destructible and randomly generated, daylight is for exploring, mining rare minerals, forging powerful weapons, and building your fortress. As the sun sets, monsters emerge to attack your base.

name: Ghost Vanguard
description: Ghost Vanguard is a Beat'em Up game that combines stylish action with roguelike elements. Grab your sword and step into treacherous evil dungeons, using stylish and magnificent combos to defeat the sinister forces from the darkness!

name: Metal Exile
description: Leap, grapple, and blast your way through monsters and hazards in this retro 2D action-platformer. Explore, buy upgrades, and equip different suits and weapons to survive a variety of hazards and ultimately escape from Exile.

name: Cleaning Time VR
description: Clean up your virtual world with "Cleaning Time VR", a fun and immersive game that challenges you to clear away the clutter! Use your skills and special virtual tools to reign victorious as you scrub, wash, and mow your way to success.

name: Priscillas Dream
description: In this Top-Down RPG game, players find themselves stranded in a vast and unforgiving desert, facing challenges and obstacles at every turn. The game begins with the player character waking up in the middle of the desert, surrounded by a small group of survivors who are also struggling to survive.

name: Gridlock Gladiators
description: A real-time fast paced fighting game with deck building. Create your own unique characters, fight to collect new abilities and armor, and perform flashy combos to smash your opponent out of the ring in grid based combat!

name: Oblivistar
description: Oblivistar is a story-driven adventure game where you will help solve a mystery that sinks into the place you call home.

name: Meow Planet
description: Welcome to "Meow Planet"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden feline inhabitants on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: Ghost Hand
description: Ghost Hand is a game focused on combat and exploration, which follows the story of its protagonist, Iria with a non-linear progression. Iria is a young wizard apprentice who lives on the moon. Iria is on the hunt for her father, a long-lost powerful mage, while encountering all sorts of enemies.

name: Hammer Bros
description: Hammer Dudes is a casual 2D platform fighter. Dodge, throw and strike with your hammer to defeat your opponent and reach their final scene! Play on the couch with a buddy or even online in this competitve and crazy 1v1 game.

name: Bahamut and the Waqwaq Tree
description: Discover a once-thriving ocean, now tainted by enigmatic dark forces. Your quest: decipher the mystery and rekindle the ocean's radiant light.

name: End of Space Project
description: Take command of a spaceship, try to get home. A science fiction adventure game.Weapons, crew, morally ambiguous actions and cats in spacesuits.

name: Nounishpunk
description: Nounishpunk is an exhilarating, fast-paced third-person comedy action-adventure shooter set in an open world, boasting a captivating fantasy futurism art style.

name: Daisy Grotto
description: Daisy Grotto is a cozy, retro. and clever 2D role-playing adventure. Explore a magical world - Meet interesting characters, collect fun items, and fight fierce monsters in interactive turn-based combat! Develop your party and leverage their unique abilities to uncover the secrets of the Daisy Grotto.

name: Playroom Invasion TD
description: Playroom Invasion TD invites you to an exciting tower defense adventure set in a nursery filled with toy characters and towers. Take part in fun and tactical battles against evil toys trying to take over your room which is full of towers with different features.

name: ReactFuse
description: Master the power of two weapons at once and switch between other weapons strategically. Amp up the intensity by charging your weapon's bullets. Watch as your shots glow with power, ready to deliver devastating effects upon impact in our FPS multiplayer game.

name: Search & Find: Hidden Objects
description: With beautifully detailed, hand-illustrated pictures by published puzzle artist Adam Doyle, Search and Find - Hidden Objects serves a relaxing adventure for everyone ready to perfect their spotting skills.

name: Shattered World
description: Play as the your sisters hero as you fight monsters along the way and make friends as well.

name: Son of Perun Kharkiv
description: Son of Perun: Kharkiv is a first-person shooter in the setting of Kharkiv of the future and retrowawe.

name: Snaky Survivor
description: Navigate the stark world of Snaky Survivor, an arcade game that pits you against starvation and challenges your survival instincts. Guide a snake-like character as it gathers soul fragments to stave off hunger, weaving through hazardous obstacles in a race against time.

name: Starstride
description: You need to decide the faction you are born into and fight for it, gradually becoming the most powerful Star Warrior. Power armor and energy core will be one of the most important cores that accompany players' growth. You can freely create your own mecha set and conquer the entire vast universe.

name: StellarEchoes: Terrain Explorer
description: StellarEchoes:TerrainExplorer is a terrain adventure and shooting battle game featuring spaceships and a target planet training ground. SteamVR needs to be set up to run with OpenXR.

name: Simple Solitaire
description: Play the most basic and simple game of solitaire. This game follows the rules of TriPeaks.

name: Sunland Hike
description: Unveil the tranquility of nature in this captivating walking simulator. Immerse yourself in the picturesque landscapes of Sunland, where every step leads to a new discovery. Your ultimate goal? Find hidden gems scattered throughout the terrain, each more breathtaking than the last. ️
